about_the_game:
This is a story-driven simulation game that allows players to experience mainstream Hanfu styles while playing. We hope this game will be an opportunity for players to learn about and develop a love for Hanfu. Please add us to your wishlist and support us. Thank you!

Follow us:

Bilibili Channel: Shen Yi Hua
QQ Group: 832613494

——————————————————————————————————

If you want to learn about Hanfu styles, this game is a great choice.
If you’ve been single for a long time and want to experience romance, whether you choose a boy or a girl, you can enter the Hanfu marriage hall.
If you want to open a Hanfu shop, this game will undoubtedly be your vanguard.
If you want to experience entrepreneurship, this game will provide you with a unique experience.

We hope this game becomes a chance for you to understand and appreciate Hanfu.

Game Features:

★ Learn about Hanfu styles: In this game, players will discover many Hanfu styles and experience the process of making a piece of Hanfu.

★ A taste of romance: Players can pursue male or female characters in the game. Once affection reaches a certain level, the hand-holding mode can be unlocked, allowing you to date, dine, and play with your favorite character.

★ Learn about Hanfu styles: In this game, players will discover many Hanfu styles and experience the process of making a piece of Hanfu.

★ Simple entrepreneurship: Say goodbye to complicated business simulation games. This game allows you to experience the sense of achievement in opening a Hanfu store.

★ Escape room scenarios: In real life, escape rooms might have many taboos, but in this game, you can explore boldly without spending too much money.

★ Interesting Hanfu stories: Sad or joyful Hanfu stories await your discovery.

★ Cute-style graphics: Original characters, animations, and scene designs.

————————————————————————————————————————

"With beautiful clothing, it is called ‘Hua’ (flourish),
With great etiquette, it is called ‘Xia’ (summer)."

The game is set against the background of the current Hanfu movement. Starting with managing a Hanfu shop, you will learn about various Hanfu styles, meet your favorite characters, and even hold a Hanfu wedding (whether you are male or female), entering the hall of love.

short_description: A Hanbok based game. You will learn about various styles, solar terms, customs, backgrounds, cultural connotations, and history of Hanfu. And interact with favorite characters, such as holding hands, or hold a Hanfu wedding. Please join the wish list to support and bow~
